Articles.Content:
Here we are! The BluPlanet Association has finished with its 9th craft/craft family, the BluBodyne Kerbin Satellite Family. It includes 6 different satellites for your own space program. Download: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/5ux2956m5n81uep/JH8OwUAJdw

CloudWatch: A weather satellite designed to monitor cloud systems...if there are any

FarScan: A unique satellite with special scientific goals, mainly exploring the mysteries of deep space

GPS K-Synch: A GPS mapping satellite intended to reach keostationary orbit

HACK-Sat: Military spy satellite to keep and eye on enemy kountries

Public ComSat: Provides telecommunication for kerbals to enjoy

kelivision and use kellphones

SpaceOps ComSat: Satellites used to communicate with kerbals on space missions, for example the mun
